author: gmcdonald
msg: Add a note about external mail lists coming to incubator that will do not autosubscribe users. Build site - along with the build came in with it changes to mrunit and hcatalog pages.

author: hboutemy
msg: [MNG-5119] added Javadocs and JXR links in left menu for every module to give easy access to code

author: veithen
msg: Set project.url explicitly in all POMs. Reason: the URLs calculated by Maven point to non existing locations. This causes broken links in dependency reports and Javadoc in downstream projects.

author: norman
msg: Fix a regression which was introduced while removed the Header model class. See MAILBOX-90

author: norman
msg: Make sure LazySkippingInputStream does skip all needed bytes. See MAILBOX-95
